enhanced_by.reason: Both methods involve managing Arg objects within the Field class, with addArg setting up the Arg objects that getArg retrieves.
ensureArgsCapacity ensures the args array can hold the given Arg, which is a prerequisite for getArg to retrieve it.
getArgs retrieves an array of Arg objects based on a key, similar to how getArg retrieves a single Arg object based on a key and position.
getVar retrieves a Var object based on a key, similar to how getArg retrieves an Arg object based on a key and position, both methods involve key-based retrieval.
